Package co.aurasphere.assignables.policy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AssignmentPolicy
    Interface that defines how a value should be put into a variable.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssignIfNotAlreadyThereAssigmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy that assigns a value to a variable if the variable doesn't contain that value already.
    CleanAssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy that cleans the memory after setting a value into a variable.
    DoAfterDelayAssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy that waits DoAfterDelayAssignmentPolicy.delayMillisec before doing the assignment.
    ExplosiveAssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy that always throws an AssignmentException after doing an assignment.
    JavaLegacyAssignmentPolicy
    Plain old (unsafe) and boring Java AssignmentPolicy.
    LoggingAssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy that logs the assignment.
    MD5AssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy that populates the variable with the MD5 Hash of the variable.
    NopeAssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy that does nothing really.
    OptionalAssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy which assigns a value into a variable only if the value is not null.
    PerformanceMonitorAssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy for monitoring assignment performances.
    SafeAssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy that does an assignment safely.
    StochasticAssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy with stochastic behavior.
    UnsupportedAssignmentPolicy
    AssignmentPolicy for an unsupported assignment.
